properties.entry: INSERT INTO PROJECT ( PROJECT_ID, CLIENT_ID, REQUIRED_SKILL, PROJECT_NAME, DESCRIPTION, PROJECT_STATUS, EXPECT_START, EXPECT_END, MEANS_OF_PAYMENT, MIN_BID, MAX_BID, START_BID, END_BID, COUNT_BID, AVERAGE_BID, WINNER_ID, WINNING_BID, START_DATE, END_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_PROJ.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, ?, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL )

SELECT PROJECT_ID , CLIENT_ID , REQUIRED_SKILL , PROJECT_NAME , DESCRIPTION , PROJECT_STATUS , EXPECT_START , EXPECT_END , MEANS_OF_PAYMENT , MIN_BID , MAX_BID , START_BID , END_BID , COUNT_BID , AVERAGE_BID , WINNER_ID , WINNING_BID , START_DATE , END_DATE FROM PROJECT JOIN MEMBER ON (CLIENT_ID = USER_ID) WHERE WINNER_ID = ? AND NOT PROJECT_STATUS = 'DELETE' ORDER BY PROJECT_ID DESC

SELECT PROJECT_ID , CLIENT_ID , REQUIRED_SKILL , PROJECT_NAME , DESCRIPTION , PROJECT_STATUS , EXPECT_START , EXPECT_END , MEANS_OF_PAYMENT , MIN_BID , MAX_BID , START_BID , END_BID , COUNT_BID , AVERAGE_BID , WINNER_ID , WINNING_BID , START_DATE , END_DATE FROM PROJECT JOIN MEMBER ON (CLIENT_ID = USER_ID) WHERE CLIENT_ID = ? AND NOT PROJECT_STATUS = 'DELETE' ORDER BY PROJECT_ID DESC

SELECT PROJECT_ID , CLIENT_ID , REQUIRED_SKILL , PROJECT_NAME , DESCRIPTION , PROJECT_STATUS , EXPECT_START , EXPECT_END , MEANS_OF_PAYMENT , MIN_BID , MAX_BID , START_BID , END_BID , COUNT_BID , AVERAGE_BID , WINNER_ID , WINNING_BID , START_DATE , END_DATE FROM PROJECT JOIN MEMBER ON (CLIENT_ID = USER_ID) WHERE PROJECT_ID = ? AND (CLIENT_ID = ? OR WINNER_ID = ?) AND NOT PROJECT_STATUS = 'DELETE'
UPDATE PROJECT SET PROJECT_STATUS = 'DELETE' WHERE PROJECT_ID = ? AND CLIENT_ID = ? AND NOT PROJECT_STATUS = 'DELETE'
UPDATE PROJECT SET WINNER_ID = NULL , PROJECT_STATUS = 'HOLD' WHERE PROJECT_ID = ? AND WINNER_ID = ? AND NOT PROJECT_STATUS IN ('DELETE', 'OPEN')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT WHERE PROJECT_STATUS='OPEN' AND MIN_BID BETWEEN 200000 AND ? AND MAX_BID BETWEEN ? AND 5000000;

SELECT PROJECT_ID , PROJECT_NAME , PROJECT_STATUS , DESCRIPTION , END_BID , MIN_BID , MAX_BID , COUNT_BID FROM PROJECT WHERE PROJECT_STATUS='OPEN' AND MIN_BID BETWEEN 200000 AND ? AND MAX_BID BETWEEN ? AND 5000000 ORDER BY PROJECT_ID DESC
SELECT PROJECT_ID , PROJECT_NAME , PROJECT_STATUS , DESCRIPTION , END_BID , MIN_BID , MAX_BID , COUNT_BID FROM PROJECT WHERE PROJECT_STATUS='OPEN' ORDER BY PROJECT_ID DESC
SELECT USER_ID , EXCELLENT_FREELANCE , SKILL , PAY_RATE , LOCATION , SELF_INTRODUCTION , PROFILE_IMAGE FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND ADMIN = 'N' ORDER BY USER_ID DESC

SELECT PROJECT_ID , CLIENT_ID , REQUIRED_SKILL , PROJECT_NAME , DESCRIPTION , PROJECT_STATUS , EXPECT_START , EXPECT_END , MEANS_OF_PAYMENT , MIN_BID , MAX_BID , START_BID , END_BID , COUNT_BID , AVERAGE_BID , WINNER_ID , WINNING_BID , START_DATE , END_DATE FROM PROJECT WHERE PROJECT_ID = ? AND NOT PROJECT_STATUS = 'DELETE'

SELECT USER_ID , EXCELLENT_FREELANCE , SKILL , PAY_RATE , LOCATION , SELF_INTRODUCTION , PROFILE_IMAGE FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND ADMIN = 'N' AND EXCELLENT_FREELANCE = 'Y' ORDER BY USER_ID DESC;
